post_content:
T206 Chance (Batting)-crease top left which is evident on the back top right. Crease in top border to the right of the aforementioned crease and another in the top border to the right of that. Corner wear. Also, a wrinkle through the first "C" in "CHICAGO". Most of the back is stained. Lower back right crease through the "2D" at the bottom right-$180.00.

S/h is $5.00 unless it is California, Oregon or the state of Washington in which cases the s/h is $5.50. If paying by PayPal, please pay by PayPal Gift/Friends and Family to [url]wizard15243@yahoo.com[/url].
